overview.archetype: Single Target & AoE Damage / Skill Cooldown Manipulation

a1.name: Vorpal Sword
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the target has any active skills on cooldown. Each hit has an 80% chance of decreasing the duration of a random buff on the target by 1 turn.

a2.name: Clockwork Cyclone
a2.notes: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of increasing the cooldowns of all enemy skills by 2 turns. 75% chance of decreasing each target’s Turn Meter by 15%. If at least one of a target’s skills is increased to max cooldown, decreases their Turn Meter by 30% instead.

a3.name: Queenslayer
a3.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Ignores 20% of the target’s DEF. If the initial target is killed, also attacks the enemy with the lowest HP, also ignoring 20% of their DEF.

passive.impact: Whenever this Champion attacks, inflicts 3% bonus damage to each target for each turn remaining on all of their skill’s cooldowns. Resets the cooldown of one of this Champion’s skills each time they kill an enemy (once per skill).

booking.notes: Books increase damage, debuff chance, and reduce cooldowns on A2 and A3.

scenarios.notes: Consistent procs due to frequent A1 usage, but not a top-tier Clan Boss DPS.
Helmsmasher enables DEF ignore on A3 for maximum nuking.
Synergizes with A2/A3 for boss control and burst.

clan_boss.notes: Provides some utility and damage, but not a top-tier Clan Boss champion. Best used for cooldown control and bonus damage against bosses with skills on cooldown.

synergy.relentless_viability: Excellent for more frequent skill cycling and bonus damage.

investment.notes: Top-tier for Arena, Doom Tower, and boss control. High value for cooldown manipulation and nuking.

owned_comparison.comparison: Alice offers more control and utility, Trunda is pure AoE nuker.
Arbiter is a reviver and speed booster, Alice is a nuker and control specialist.

draft_logic.notes: Safe early pick for any team needing damage and cooldown control. Not a reviver, so pair with support.

gear_set_stability.Relentless: Very strong for more frequent skill use.

utility_comparison.comparison: Trunda is pure AoE, Alice brings cooldown control and bonus damage.
Arbiter offers revive and TM boost, Alice offers more damage and control.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Helmsmasher for PvE/PvP, Warmaster for Clan Boss
final_summary.damage_rotation: High burst with A3, strong AoE with A2, bonus damage from passive
final_summary.passive_impact: Major, enables bonus damage and skill resets
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize C.RATE, C.DMG, ATK%, ACC, SPD
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Works best with buffers, TM boosters, and revivers

team_setups.name: Arena Nuker + Control
team_setups.strategy: Speed boost, debuff, then nuke and control enemy cooldowns

team_setups.name: Doom Tower Boss Control
team_setups.strategy: Sustain, revive, and control boss skills with Alice's A2

similar_champions.similarity_reason: Both are top-tier nukers with high burst potential
Both have DEF ignore and bonus hit mechanics
